Class ShortVector.VariableSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.ShortVector.VariableSerializer

    public static class ShortVector.VariableSerializer
extends Object
implements ByteBufferSerializer<ShortVector>
    Serialization class for variable dimensionality by using VarInt encoding.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
